hopobject.name: Minilaptop
hopobject.body: The hardware list: Beagleboard Rev.C3 Toshiba Matsushita LTD089EXWS 8.9" WXGA panel, Led backlight. Texas Intruments SN75LVDS83B for panel. DYI PWM controller for backlight. Microchip ENC28J60 ethernet controller. + much more to come.
hopobject.shortdesc: Well i'm making minilaptop based on beagleboard. Some goals for this project: 8.9" LVDS screen, light weight ~1.5kg max, battery lifetime over 4h, ethernet, usb wlan built in. All dyi :P
